mapper.select: SELECT og.uuid, og.order_num, og.created_time, og.store_uuid, s.store_name, s.company_name, s.company_address_detail, og.delivery_address, og.contacts, og.mobile, og.actual_amount, og.receivable_amount, og.pay_type, og.order_sts, og.delivery_mode, og.order_remark, og.refund_type, og.refund_amount, og.after_sale_cause, og.after_sale_sts, og.refund_sts, og.after_sale_remark, og.amt_express, og.service_sts, og.goods_uuid, og.goods_name, og.goods_num, og.goods_img_url FROM order_goods og LEFT JOIN store s ON og.store_uuid = s.uuid where og.sts = 0 and og.uuid = #{uuid}
